The goal of survnip is to ...

## Installation

You can install the released version of survnip from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("survnip")
```

## Models

- Kaplan_Meier
  - survival::survfit()

- Cox_model
  - survival::coxph()
  - glmnet::glmnet()
  - penalized::penalized()

- Nelson_Aalen
  - survival::survfit()
  - timereg::aalen()
  
- boosting
  - gbm::gbm()
  
- decision_tree
  - rpart::rpart()
  - party::ctree()
  
- random forest
  - randomForestSRC::rfsrc()
  - ranger::ranger()
  - rpart::rpart()
  
- svm 
  - survivalsvm::survivalsvm()
